description: Just yesterday you were at a convention with your friends.  Now, the world is falling apart.  Though you long to see them again, something about the collapse of society unlocks a deep, feline desire to explore!  And maybe even become what you've secretly wanted all your life…

Just yesterday you were at a convention with your friends.  Now, the world is falling apart.  Though you long to see them again, something about the collapse of society unlocks a deep, canine desire to run free and find your pack!  And maybe even become what you've secretly wanted all your life…
